column1: #Text=City, Twelve oclock—This is the settling day in the English money market: and, from the great rise in Consols, it has been looked to for some days past with great interest and apprehension The latter has been, in some measure, realised by the declaration of two defaulters for very large differences : one, in particular had speculated to a great amount for a fall.

#Text=This, of course, has exrited great dismay ; but has not been followed by any others of consquence—lt has proved a " near" acconnt; and the consequence of this has been a very considerable rise in the price of stock Consols with the dividend, being quoted as high as 88j|, or 87.1 L exdividend for the next account.
#Text=Money stock has likewise risen very con" siderably ; the 4 per cents, ot 1826 are quoted as high as 103 and 3 per cents, reduced are 88.
